snippet.title: myPOPGOES: New and Improved! (LAUNCH TRAILER)
snippet.description:
Buy myPOPGOES: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2429350/myPOPGOES/

myPOPGOES has been reprogrammed from scratch, with countless fixes, optimisations, and brand new features! New and Improved! is out NOW as a free update to the game on Steam.

Check out this video to learn everything about New and Improved! 

---

myPOPGOES is an official Five Nights at Freddy's spinoff game, releasing as the latest entry in the POPGOES series for the "10 YEARS" anniversary event! In this game you play as Bonnie Glade (a central figure in the POPGOES lore) on her 10th birthday, playing with a LCD toy given to her by her father.

Most of myPOPGOES' gameplay is based on a "survival" resource management game housed in the toy, where you try to keep a cute and pixelated Popgoes the Weasel alive by giving him food, entertainment, and Dat Taste (the most refreshing drink in the Candy + Popgoes Universe). This game mode is expanded in the Steam release with special challenge modes and rewards. 

This new version of myPOPGOES also includes five totally different game modes like Fishing and Longest Popgoes, each with their own gameplay styles, though they are all nice and simple (and only use three buttons to play!).

myPOPGOES also features a plethora of unlockables and customisation options, like playable characters, stickers, toy skins, character sheets, and diary entries. It's a cute, casual, colourful, fun collection of games.

And it can get a bit creepy too.

Five Nights at Freddy's by Scott Cawthon
POPGOES by Kane Carter
